title: how do you buy rune pages?
body: I have been gone from the game for a while and I can't find the option to buy more rune pages anywhere in the store.

replies.body:
You can find Rune Pages after first ensuring all your sorting on the left side of the shop page list *Show All* under sorting. Below is a screenshot that shows what I mean.

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

I hope that helped!
That's rather poor design, honestly. You should move runepages to the same section as random champion icons and chests.
I've had the same problem, everything online that gives direction on it seems to be outdated with the new hub. Got a lot of IP and really need another rune page :(
glad it's not just me, but it sucks no answers
